name: fireside-capital-dashboard
description: The Fireside Capital Dashboard is a modern personal finance tracking tool built with HTML, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. It allows users to track their assets, investments, debts, and calculate real-time net worth with snapshot history and visual reporting.

scripts.test:manual: echo "See tests/manual-test-plan.md for manual testing instructions"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npm run css:concat && npm run css:minify
